  2. Big tech vows action on 'deceptive' AI in elections  BBC.com
  3. Microsoft, Google, Amazon and tech peers sign pact to combat election-related misinformation  CNBC
  4. Leading tech firms pledge to address election risks posed by AI  CNN
  5. Tech giants come together to combat deceptive deepfakes ahead of 2024 elections  ABC News
